body: colors are bit off, tanned in the cover, pale in the content, imagine fucking that up when the cover had the color schemes already laid out for you. Also, it's much more preferable when the artists use random faceless type, it's only a problem for idiots who want to see vanilla crap between the main cast, it has been 1K+ episodes/chapters and the retarded, embarrassing rabid "shippers" still don't get it that one piece isn't a fucking romcom show, although it does have its moments (probably an industry/cultural mandatory thing to shoehorn that shit into every form/piece of media to both appeal to the majority-lowest common denominator, aka "normies", who eat that crap up or to perhaps to entice the hikikomoris(shut-ins)/otakus(nerds) to try their luck out there) where it's a subplot/plot vehicle, filler. It's never between the crew members themselves. Plenty of crap with the typical jap author self-insert giving himself a harem with the obligatory yellow/red haired foreign main girl.
robin is cute asf in here
If it with random faceless bastards, and not faithful artstyle, then don't call it a doujinshi. It's just an original hentai
makes me sad seeing nami look so happy after seeing a strangers dick and thinking about getting gang banged
